src:
【富二代露鳥57秒4】周興哲知名度大勝哥哥　還跟楊祐寧搶女人
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
雖然周予天的先天條件算是頗優，但他的聲勢、知名度都明顯不如弟弟，在台灣的娛樂新聞都只能跟弟弟黏在一起，比如擔任弟弟周興哲在TICC演唱會的第一場嘉賓，當時還上演兄弟情深戲碼，沒想到私下「哥醉弟陪」的情誼也十分感人。



不僅演藝事業，周予天的私事其實也沒周興哲來得精采萬分；之前從事美妝買賣的Melinda王周旋在周興哲及楊祐寧之間。








有傳言指周興哲當時因這名「祐嫂」無心工作，而且為了見她還不理宣傳、硬要跟人家見面；宣傳對周興哲不爽之餘，還得幫他對外賠不是。尤其祐嫂不僅玩弄周興哲，還攪亂他的朋友圈，但周興哲仍然死心塌地，對祐嫂言聽計從。
只是祐嫂後來改愛楊祐寧，對照周興哲一度感情、工作不順，垮臉又屢爆耍大牌，時間點相當接近。如今周興哲有了前主播女友趙岱新，事過境遷後，經紀人回應：「對於工作，周興哲都盡力去做。」並且「祝福大家都很好。」；楊祐寧跟「祐嫂」方面則沒有回應。

★《鏡週刊》關心您：未滿18歲禁止飲酒，飲酒過量害人害己，酒後不開車，安全有保障。

更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:45
text:
[Fu II generation of exposed birds 57 seconds 4] Zhou Xingzhe's popularity is better than his brother, and Yang Youning grabs a woman.
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
Although Zhou Yutian’s innate condition is quite good, his voice and popularity are obviously not as good as his younger brother. The entertainment news in Taiwan can only be glued to his brother, such as his first brother, Zhou Xingzhe’s first guest at the TICC concert. After the performance of the brothers' deep feelings, I did not expect that the friendship of the "brothers and brothers" was very touching.



Not only in the performing arts, Zhou Yutian’s private affairs actually did not have the brilliance of Zhou Xingzhe; Melinda Wang Zhouxuan, who was engaged in beauty sales, was between Zhou Xingzhe and Yang Youning.








There are rumors that Zhou Xingzhe was unwilling to work because of this "you", and in order to see her, she ignored the propaganda and insisted on meeting others; propaganda was not good for Zhou Xingzhe, but he had to help him to pay compensation. In particular, Yuki not only played with Zhou Xingzhe, but also disturbed his circle of friends, but Zhou Xingzhe was still dying, listening to Yu’s words.
It was only after you changed your love to Yang Youning. Compared with Zhou Xingzhe’s feelings and work, his face was repeatedly smashed and the time was quite close. Now Zhou Xingzhe has a former anchor girlfriend Zhao Xinxin. After the event, the agent responded: "For the work, Zhou Xingzhe tried his best to do it." And "Bless everyone is very good." Yang Youning and "Yu Yu" did not respond.

★ "Mirror Weekly" cares about you: drinking alcohol is prohibited under the age of 18, drinking too much harms others, driving after drinking, safe and secure.

Update time|2019.11.05 11:45
